Description.Name: Isorla Spicy
Description.Details:
The Trial is over and you have proven yourself in the ways of the clans.

Darius approaches, "Commander, do you wish to enact your rights to claim your opponent as a [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondsman],bondsman]]?"

Description.Name: [Neg.] That surat has no place with us.
Reject MytchHoff
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Captain Mytch Hoff, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Reject HolliJones
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Commander Holli Jones, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Reject PheonaOReilly
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Captain Pheona O'Reilly, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Reject AlekYanev
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Commander Alek Yanev, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Reject Lukas Furey
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Captain Lukas Furey, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Reject Lumen Furey
Description.Details: You turn from Darius to look at your former opponent.  "Star Captain Lumen Furey, you failed the Trial, and failed to impress me.  I have no need of one such as you within our ranks."

Description.Name: Bondsref
Description.Details:
You look your former opponent in the eyes, "You fought valiantly, and I now claim you as my [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondsman],bondsman]].  You will wear this bondscord until you have sufficently demonstrated all three virtues: combat talent, integrity and loyalty."

As you reach forward to place the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondsman],bondsman]] on the MechWarrior's wrist, they pull their arm behind them, "My honour will not alBN me to become a [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondcord],bondcord]].  I claim my right of refusal."

You nod assent, "As you wish, MechWarrior."

You feel saddened at the loss of a potentially great pilot.

Description.Name: Take Bondsman MytchHoff
Description.Details: You look your former opponent in the eyes, "You fought valiantly Star Captain Mytch Hoff, and I now claim you as my [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondsman],bondsman]]. You will wear this [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondcord],bondcord]] until you have sufficently demonstrated all three virtues: combat talent, integrity and loyalty." You reach foward and attach the bondscord to Star Captain Mytch Hoff's right wrist, "With this [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondcord],bondcord]], I claim you as [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondsman],bondsman]]." Star Captain Mytch Hoff is now added to your barracks.

Description.Details: You look your former opponent in the eyes, "You fought valiantly Star Commander Holli Jones, and I now claim you as my [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondswoman],bondswoman]]. You will wear this [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBondcord],bondcord]] until you have sufficently demonstrated all three virtues: combat talent, integrity and loyalty."
